nodes.text: Around 21 BBY, this Zygerrian was working as a slaver in the Labor Processing Hub on Kadavo.

This Zygerrian slaver worked in the Labor Processing Hub during the time when High Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi, Captain Rex and Togruta colonists of Kiros, Roshti were imprisoned there. He was seen whipping a Togruta slave with a Shock whip when the Togruta wanted to rest.
